name: Greendale Runners
tagline: Another Tower Defense game for iOS
body:
### Welcome to my game!
This is my Tower Defense game made for iOS using the Cocos2D framework. 
The project includes de Xcode project and it's ready to use! Enjoy!

![MainScreenshot](http://s27.postimg.org/rglzglyeb/Captura_de_pantalla_de_Simulador_i_OS_9_8_2014_23.png)

![Splash Screen](http://s29.postimg.org/8u5hktc5j/Captura_de_pantalla_de_Simulador_i_OS_9_8_2014_23.png)

![Screenshot 2](http://s28.postimg.org/g6i8olitp/Captura_de_pantalla_de_Simulador_i_OS_9_8_2014_23.png)

> Inspired on Digital Estate Planning: The Game https://github.com/hawkthorne/hawkthorne-journey
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
